text: ve log jo bade gunaahon aur ashleel karmon se bachate hai, yah aur baat hai ki sanyogabash koee chhotee buraee unase ho jae. nishchay hee tumhaara rab kshamaasheelata me bada vyaapak hai. vah tumhen us samay se bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai, jabaki usane tumhen dharatee se paida kiya aur jabaki tum apanee maano ke peton mein bhrun avastha mein the. atah apane man kee pavitrata aur nikhaar ka daava na karo. vah us vyakti ko bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai, jisane dar rakha
